extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is running VMware Aria Operations for Logs version 8.x before 8.14 or VMware Cloud Foundation (VMware Aria Operations for Logs) versions 5.x and 4.x.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to the Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update VMware Aria Operations for Logs to version 8.14 or later, and VMware Cloud Foundation (VMware Aria Operations for Logs) to the latest available version.

cve_id: VMware Aria Operations for Logs Vulnerability
affected_products: VMware Aria Operations for Logs running on version 8.x before version 8.14
VMware Cloud Foundation (VMware Aria Operations for Logs) running on versions 5.x and 4.x
